がる_123.explanation: An auxiliary verb attached to a psychological/physiological adjective meaning a person other than the speaker shows signs of ~

に_289.explanation: A particle that indicates a point of time at which something takes place.

ても_468.explanation: [x] is used when that which is expressed in the main clause is not what is expected from the content of the dependent ([x]) clause.

てもいい_471.translation: May; It is all right if

みる_246.translation: Do something and see; try to do something

しまう_403.translation: Have dome something; finish doing something; finish something up

ことが出来る・できる_200.grammar_point: ことが出来る・できる

より_564.explanation: A particle which indicates that something/someone is being compared with something/someone.

ようと思う_569.explanation: The speaker desires or decides to do something.

ことになる_202.translation: It will be decided that ~; come about ~; be arranged that ~; turn out that ~

の | It is that ~_322.explanation: A sentence-final particle used by a female or a child to indicate an explanation or emotive emphasis.

少ない・すくない_427.translation: Few; a small number of; little; a small quantity of ~

を_351.explanation: A particle that marks the location from which some movement begins.

を_352.explanation: A particle that marks the cause of some human emotion.

に_292.explanation: A particle that indicates an agent or a source in passive, causative, もらう/てまらう and other receiving constructions.

に_295.explanation: A particle that indicates the surface of something upon which some action directly takes place.

で_106.explanation: A particle which indicates the use of something for doing something.

する_434.explanation: Someone or something has some (semi)permanent attribute.

やはり_538.translation: Still; also; after all; as expected; you know

そうだ_410.explanation: An auxiliary adjective which indicates that what is expressed by the preceding sentence is the speaker’s conjecture concerning an event in the future or the present state of someone or something, based on what the speaker sees or feels.

や_536.explanation: A coordinate conjunction that is used to list two or more items (nouns or noun phrases) in an inexhaustive fashion

で_109.explanation: A particle which indicates the time when something terminates or the amount of time a period of activity has taken.

から_179.explanation: A subordinate conjunction which expresses a reason or a cause.

こと_193.explanation: A nominaliser used to indicate the speaker’s relative lack of empathy with the content of the sentence he is nominalising.

に_299.explanation: A particle which indicates the location where someone or something exists.

と_478.explanation: A particle which marks a quotation, sound or the manner in which someone/something does something.

より_567.explanation: A particle which indicates a set point in terms of space or time.

様・さま_384.explanation:
A suffix (originally meaning 'appearance') that indicates the speaker's/writer's politeness towards someone.

*Old children's book title

毎・まい_233.explanation: A prefix which means ‘every (unit of time)’.

始める・はじめる_131.explanation: Someone/something begins to do something or begins to be in some state.

ことにする_204.explanation: A volitional decision to do something is made.

なくなる_277.explanation: It has reached the point where some state or action does not take place anymore.

ように言う_556.explanation: Tell someone in such a way that he will do something.

あまり_3.translation: Because of too much ~; because ~ too much; so ~ that ~

であろう_29.explanation: An auxiliary which indicates the writer's conjecture which is not based on any particular information or evidence.

どうも_36.translation: I don't know why but; I cannot manage to; just; from what I gather; seem; no matter how ~; I gather that ~; for some reason

がち_47.translation: Tend to; be prone to; be apt to; be liable to; be subject to; often

以外_60.translation: Other than; except (for); but; besides; as well as

以上（は）_64.translation: Since; now that; once; if ~ at all; as long as; so long as

一方で（は） ~ 他方で（は）_73.grammar_point: 一方で（は） ~ 他方で（は）

上_76.translation: From the viewpoint of; for (the sake of); for (the reason); in (terms of); relating to; in –ing

限り_82.explanation: A conjunction which expresses the idea "as long as (a certain condition is met)" or "as long as (= to the extent)".

限り_85.explanation: A suffix which expresses the idea of "(last) only until" or "limited".

か~か_87.explanation: structure to mark two choices or possibilities about which the speaker/writer is not sure.

かな_90.explanation: A sentence-final particle that indicates a self-addressed question or a question addressed to an in-group member.

必ずしも_92.explanation: An adverb that indicates that the proposition expressed in the sentence is not always true.

かねる_96.translation: Cannot; be not in a position to; hardly possible; hard; hesitate to do
かねる_96.explanation: An auxiliary expressing that someone cannot do something even if s/he wants to do it.

から~に至るまで_99.translation: Starting with ~ ending with ~; from ~ to ~
から~に至るまで_99.explanation: A structure that expresses a wide range of things.

から~にかけて_101.translation: Through ~ into ~; through ~ on to; from ~ till/to
から~にかけて_101.explanation: A structure that expresses coverage from one time/location into the other.

からと言って_103.translation: Just because; even if; even though
からと言って_103.explanation: A conjunction which introduces the reason for someone's action or for someone's having some idea, and conveys disapproval of the action or idea.

かろう_106.explanation: An auxiliary indicating the writer's conjecture which is not based on any particular information or evidence.

方をする_109.explanation: A phrase to indicate a manner of doing something.

かと言うと_114.translation: You would think that ~ but (that is not right)
かと言うと_114.explanation: A conjunction to indicate the speaker's assertion that a popular belief is not right.

（の）代わりに_116.translation: Instead of; instead; but (to make up for ~); so (to make up for ~); in place of
（の）代わりに_116.explanation: An action/state that is expressed in the subordinate clause is balanced by another action/state expressed in the main clause, or something/someone that is replaced by something/someone else.

結果_121.translation: As a result of; after; upon
結果_121.explanation: A noun which expresses the idea "as a result of".

結構_123.explanation: An adverb that indicates that something exceeds the speaker's and/or hearer's expectation to a considerable degree.

この_127.translation: The last; this past; this; this coming
この_127.explanation: A demonstrative adjective which indicates a time or time period around the moment of speech.

こうした_130.explanation: A demonstrative which refers to someone or something mentioned as an example in previous discourse.

こそ_132.translation: The very ~; it is ~; that ~; only (when, after, because, etc.); in particular; precisely; definitely; [an italicized or underlined word]
こそ_132.explanation: A particle which emphasizes a word, phrase, or clause.

こと_135.translation: (don't) V; should (not); (not) ought to; may not
こと_135.explanation: An auxiliary noun to express a command.

ことで_137.translation: By V-ing; because; result in; cause
ことで_137.explanation: A compound particle which indicates a means or a cause.

ことになる_140.translation: End up (with); cause; come to mean that
ことになる_140.explanation: A phrase which indicates that an action or event leads to a certain situation or logical conclusion.

ことによる_143.translation: Be due to the fact that; be caused by; be brought about by; be the result of; because
ことによる_143.explanation: A phrase which is used to present an event as the cause of something.

ことはない_146.translation: There is no need to; not necessary; there is no possibility that; there is no chance to
ことはない_146.explanation: A phrase which expresses the idea that there is no need to do something or that there is no possibility of doing something.

く_148.explanation: A continuative form of an い-type adjective.

くらい_151.translation: To the extent that; so ~ that ~ (almost) ~; at least; the only ~; rather than ~
くらい_151.explanation: A particle which is used to express the degree of a state.

くせに_155.translation: Although; in spite of the fact that; and yet; but
くせに_155.explanation: A conjunction which expresses the speaker's contempt, anger, or disagreement about someone's action, behaviour, or state.

までもない_159.translation: Not necessary (to bother) to; do not need (to go as far as) to; do not have to
までもない_159.explanation: There is no point in going as far as to do something.

まい_161.translation: Will not; will probably not; be probably not
まい_161.explanation: An auxiliary which expresses the speaker's negative volition or conjecture.

まさか_165.translation: Incredible; never thought; never dreamed; surely not; impossible; don't tell me that ~; not at all likely; absolutely not.
まさか_165.explanation: An adverb that indicates the speaker's strong belief that something is not expected to (have) become a reality.

ましだ_169.translation: Better; less objectionable; preferable; might as well ~
ましだ_169.explanation: A phrase indicating that although someone/something (or some situation) is not satisfactory it is better than someone/something else.

または_171.explanation: A conjunction which connects two choices or possibilities expressed by noun phrases or sentences.

目_174.explanation: A suffix which represents an ordinal number.

面_176.translation: (on) the side of; (from) the aspect of; (from) the standpoint/viewpoint of; in terms of
面_176.explanation: A suffix which forms a compound that means a side of X, or an aspect of X.

みせる_177.translation: Can manage to; will definitely do; am determined to
みせる_177.explanation: The speaker's strong determination to achieve something for others to see.

も_179.explanation: A particle which implies that something else is also (not) the case.

も~ば_184.translation: Be enough to/for; if ~ at least; if ~ as much/many as ~, it will be enough to
も~ば_184.explanation: A structure which expresses the idea that a certain amount of something is sufficient to do something.

も~も_185.translation: Both ~ and ~; neither ~ nor ~; also; (not) either
も~も_185.explanation: A structure which presents two states or actions of someone or something.

もの（だ）_189.translation: (is) that which ~; (is) something which ~; (are) those which ~
もの（だ）_189.explanation: A dependent noun which is used to create a sentence structure which presents a characteristic of something.

なあ_193.translation: How ~!; what ~! ~!; I wonder; I wish
なあ_193.explanation: An exclamatory sentential particle which is used in informal male speech.

などと_197.explanation: A compound particle that indicates an approximate quote of words or ideas.

ながら（も）_199.explanation: A disjunctive conjunction used normally in written Japanese with the meaning of 'although'.

ないことも / はない_203.grammar_point: ないことも / はない
ないことも / はない_203.translation: It isn't the case that ~ not ~; it is not that ~ not ~
ないことも / はない_203.explanation: A double negative phrase used to make a conditional affirmative statement.

なかなか_206.translation: Quite; fairly; considerably; (not) easily; pretty; (not) readily
なかなか_206.explanation: An adverb used to indicate the speaker's feelings that something is impressive or his annoyance at slowness or difficulty in achieving something.

なく_211.explanation: a continuative form of ない used in written Japanese (to indicate a reason/cause for what follows if ない is attached to Adjective (い/な) and contrast if it is attached to a Noun+Copula).

何でも_215.translation: I don't know for sure, but
何でも_215.explanation: A phrase that indicates the speaker's uncertainty about something.

何しろ_216.translation: As a matter of fact; no matter what; believe it or not; you may be surprised, but ~; in fact; unbelievably
何しろ_216.explanation: An adverb that indicates the speaker's emotive feeling about some extreme state of affairs.

ならない_219.explanation: A phrase that is used to express insurmountable psychological or physical feelings.

なり~なり_223.explanation: A phrase to indicate two representative choices/examples.

なりに_227.translation: In one's own way; in one's own style
なりに_227.explanation: In a way/style that is proper to someone/something.

ねばならない_232.explanation: A phrase that indicates duty, obligation or necessity.

に_234.explanation: A sentence final particle that expresses the speaker's feeling of great regret or sympathy.

に当たって/当たり_237.translation: On the occasion of; at; in; before; prior to
に当たって/当たり_237.explanation: A compound particle that indicates occasion of doing something or of having done something in formal Japanese.

に反して/反する_241.translation: Against; contrary to; in contrast to; in violation of; while; whereas
に反して/反する_241.explanation: Contrary to or in contrast to.

にほかならない_245.explanation: A phrase that is used to indicate that an action/state mentioned in the topic phrase or clause is nothing but something.

に限らず_249.translation: Not limited to ~ (but also); not only ~ (but also)

に限らず [にかぎらず]_249.translation: Not limited to ~ (but also); not only ~ (but also)

に限って_250.explanation: A compound particle to show that only X is different from others.

に関して/関する_252.translation: Concerning; with regard to; about; on

に代わって_254.translation: In place of; replacing; on behalf of
に代わって_254.explanation: A compound particle to express replacement or substitution of a regular person/thing by someone/something.

に比べると/比べて_256.translation: Compared with/to; when compared with/to; in comparison to
に比べると/比べて_256.explanation: If we compare (it) with/to; comparing (it) with.

にもかかわらず_257.translation: Although; though; in spite of; despite; notwithstanding; nevertheless
にもかかわらず_257.explanation: Without any relation to a preceding event/situation.

になると_262.translation: When it becomes; when it comes to; when; if
になると_262.explanation: A phrase that expresses the time when an uncontrollable state or a habitual action occurs.

において/おける_265.explanation: A compound particle which indicates the place of an action/event, a state or time.

に従って/従い_268.translation: As, accordingly; in proportion to; in accordance with; following
に従って/従い_268.explanation: Something spontaneously and gradually occurs in accordance with some change.

に過ぎない_271.translation: Nothing more than; not more than; mere; merely; only; just; as little/few as; that's all
に過ぎない_271.explanation: Something or someone is nothing more than what is stated in terms of amount, degree, status, significance, etc.

に対して/対する_275.translation: Toward; to; in contrast to; whereas; in regard to; in; per
に対して/対する_275.explanation: Regarding something/someone one opposes, compares, or shows interest in regarding something/someone one opposes, compares or shows interest in.

にとって_278.explanation: From the standpoint of; so far as someone (or something) is concerned.

について_280.translation: About; on; concerning; regarding; with regard to; of

につき_283.explanation: A compound particle which expresses a rate or ratio.

につれて/つれ_285.explanation: A phrase used to indicate that a change occurs in accordance with another simultaneous change.

には_289.translation: To; in order to; for; for the purpose of ~
には_289.explanation: A conjunction/compound particle to indicate a purpose for doing something.

によって/より_297.translation: According to; due to; owing to; because of; depending on; from ~ to; by means of; on the basis of; with; by
によって/より_297.explanation: A particle that indicates means, cause, agent of passive sentence, or dependency on a situation.

の関係で_302.explanation: A phrase indicating that something takes place or does not take place because of something.

のこと_304.translation: About; in terms of; related to

のことだから_306.translation: Because ~ is habitually/usually/often that way; because
のことだから_306.explanation: Because it is a matter of X with which/whom something is habitually the case.

のみ_307.explanation: A particle which expresses a limit imposed upon an action, event, or a state.

の下で_310.explanation: Under some object; under the control or influence of someone or something.

の上では_312.translation: As far as ~ is concerned; as far as ~ goes; from the viewpoint/standpoint of; according to; in terms of

のは~のことだ_313.explanation: A structure which focuses on a time when something takes place.

ぬ_315.explanation: An archaic auxiliary that indicates negation.

お~だ_318.explanation: A phrase which expresses the speaker's respect for someone when describing that person's action or state.

をはじめ（として）_320.translation: Starting with; not only ~ but also ~
をはじめ（として）_320.explanation: A phrase that is used to give a primary example.

お~下さい_322.explanation: A phrase which expresses a highly polite request.

思われる_325.explanation: A verb that indicates what the speaker/writer feels spontaneously or his/her hesitation about asserting himself/herself.

おり_329.explanation: Vます of the auxiliary verb おる.

を通して_330.translation: Through; by the medium of; via; throughout
を通して_330.explanation: A compound particle that is used to indicate a medium through which something is done or time through which something takes place.

っぱなし_333.explanation: An auxiliary which expresses the idea that someone or something keeps doing something, or someone leaves something in an improper state.

っぽい_337.explanation: A suffix that indicates someone/something has some distinctive characteristic or an attribute identified by a noun, an adjective, or a verb to which the suffix is attached.

来_343.explanation: During a certain amount of time (something has continued up until the moment of speech or something has never been like the current state).

例の_346.explanation: A phrase which signals that the referent of the following noun phrase is definite and that the speaker expects the hearer to understand what the referent is.

Rhetorical Question_352.explanation: A question which functions as a forceful statement with no expected response.

ろくに~ない_355.translation: Not sufficiently; not satisfactorily; not properly; not well; hardly
ろくに~ない_355.explanation: A structure that is used to indicate that something animate does not or cannot do something satisfactorily/sufficiently/properly.

さ_358.translation: You know; sure; I tell you
さ_358.explanation: A sentence final particle used in highly informal speech by male speakers to express different degrees of assertion ranging from a light touch comment up to opposition or imposition.

さえ_363.translation: Even; if ~ only; if ~ just; as long as; the only thing ~ need is
さえ_363.explanation: An emphatic particle which expresses the idea of "even" in non-conditional clauses (or sentences) or the idea of "only" in conditional clauses.

際（に）_369.translation: When; on the occasion of; at the time of

さすが_374.translation: As might be expected; after all; it is only natural that ~; naturally; truly; really; indeed; impressive
さすが_374.explanation: An adverb that expresses the speaker's/writer's strong feeling that something has turned out as s/he expected.

せい_378.explanation: A dependent noun expressing a cause which brings about an undesirable result.

せめて_383.explanation: An adverb that indicates the speaker/writer's minimally satisfactory level.

次第_385.explanation: A conjunction/noun to express that an action indicated by a preceding verb or an action implied by a preceding noun is a prerequisite for another action.

しかも_390.translation: Moreover; furthermore; besides; on top of that; what's more; what's worse; more surprisingly; at that; nevertheless; and yet; even so
しかも_390.explanation: A conjunction which is used to provide additional important information.

したがって_395.explanation: A conjunction that is used to indicate that a result/situation follows necessarily from the foregoing situation.

そうかと言って_397.translation: even so; yes, but; that being said
そうかと言って_397.explanation: A structure which expresses that the speaker/writer cannot easily accept the corollary from the preceding statement owing to some circumstances, although he feels like accepting it

そこで_401.explanation: A conjunction which connects a situation presented as a reason and an action taken because of that situation

そこで_405.explanation: A conjunction which connects an event and an action taken at the time of the event

そこを_407.explanation: A conjunction used to indicate that in spite of the negative situation mentioned in the previous part of the sentence/discourse some positive effort is made.

そうになる_409.explanation: A phrase expressing that something almost happens.

その上_413.translation: On top of that; besides; moreover; furthermore; what's more; what's worse; not only ~ but also
その上_413.explanation: A conjunction which introduces an additional, emphatic statement.

それでも_418.translation: Nevertheless; yet; but in spite of that; even so
それでも_418.explanation: In spite of the circumstance expressed in the preceding sentence.

それどころか_420.translation: On the contrary; far from that; as a matter of fact
それどころか_420.explanation: A conjunction that is used to indicate that the level/degree of a fact or a situation expressed in the second sentence is far above or below the level/degree of a fact or a situation expressed in the first sentence.

それが_423.translation: Well (contrary to your expectation; I'm afraid to say this, but)
それが_423.explanation: An interjection which signals that the speaker is going to provide an unexpected response to a question.

それも_425.translation: What's more; what's worse; at that; furthermore; moreover; on top of that
それも_425.explanation: A conjunction which is used to add more specific information to information about a rather uncommon action or state.

それに_427.translation: (and) in addition; moreover; furthermore; what's more; on top of that
それに_427.explanation: A conjunction which introduces an additional item or statement.

それと_431.translation: And; also; in addition; as well
それと_431.explanation: A conjunction which introduces an additional item or statement.

それは_434.explanation: An interjection which is used when the speaker emphatically provides an expected response to a question.

それぞれ_436.explanation: Each of two or more things/persons.

すぐ_439.translation: At once; soon; right away; immediately; readily; instantly; easily; right
すぐ_439.explanation: Without having much temporal or physical distance.

たびに_442.translation: Every time; each time; on every occasion; whenever
たびに_442.explanation: A conjunction to express that each time someone/something does something, something else takes place.

ただ_445.explanation: An adverb which emphasizes the idea of "only".

ただの_449.translation: Usual; ordinary; plain; common; rank and file

確かに~が_450.translation: Indeed ~ but; certainly ~ but; truly ~ but; it is true that ~ but; I admit that ~ but; definitely ~ but
確かに~が_450.explanation: A structure which expresses the idea "indeed ~ but".

たところで_452.explanation: Even if an action or a state were realised.

て_455.explanation: After/since a point in time at which something takes place.

て初めて_456.translation: Not until; only after; for the first time
て初めて_456.explanation: A phrase which expresses the idea that someone does something or something happens only after something else happens or something else is done.

点（で）_458.translation: Point; respect; regard; aspect; way; in terms of; -wise; in that; as far as ~ is concerned
点（で）_458.explanation: A noun which expresses the idea of "a point of argument; a point of evaluation; a point of view".

ては_461.explanation: A conjunction which presents an action/state as a topic about which a negative comment is given.

と_464.explanation: A particle which makes an adverbial clause, with a verb of saying/thinking/understood after it.

と同時に_471.translation: At the same time (as); at the time; when; as; while; as well as ~
と同時に_471.explanation: A phrase which is used to express the idea that someone does something or something takes place at the same time as another action or event, or that someone or something is in two states simultaneously.

と言っても_474.translation: Although ~ say/said that ~; even though ~ say/said that ~
と言っても_474.explanation: A phrase which is used to clarify a statement in the preceding discourse which might be misleading.

という風に_478.translation: In such a way that; in such a fashion to suggest/show (etc.) that; as if to say/show (etc.) that
という風に_478.explanation: A phrase which expresses a manner or a way in which someone does something.

ということは_480.explanation: A phrase which changes a sentence into a topic noun clause.

というのに_484.translation: But; although; in spite of the fact that ~
というのに_484.explanation: A conjunction to indicate that an action/state takes place quite contrary to one's expectation.

というのは~ことだ_487.translation: Mean; the meaning of ~ is; what ~ means is
というのは~ことだ_487.explanation: A structure which is used in interpreting, explaining, or defining a word, a phrase, or a sentence.

と言うと_492.translation: When ~ mention; if ~ say that ~; when ~ say that ~; when it comes to
と言うと_492.explanation: A phrase which is used when something which someone has mentioned causes an involuntary response.

というより（は）_495.explanation: A phrase that is used to indicate more accurate characterisation of someone or something.

とかで_498.translation: For some reason like ~; saying something like ~; because ~ or something like that
とかで_498.explanation: A conjunction that is used to give an uncertain reason for something.

ところ_500.explanation: A dependent noun which is used to express the idea that when someone did something, something took place as the result.

ところが_503.explanation: A conjunction which is used to present what in fact happened or what is in fact the case when something else was/is expected.

とも_507.translation: No matter ~ may be; even if; at ~ -est
とも_507.explanation: A conjunction in written Japanese that is used to express a concession.

となる_511.explanation: A phrase which expresses the idea that someone or something becomes something.

となると_512.translation: When it comes to; if it is true that ~; if it is the case that ~; if it turns out that ~
となると_512.explanation: A phrase which expresses the idea "when it comes to" or "if it is true that".

通り（に）_514.translation: (in) the same way as; (in) the way; as
通り（に）_514.explanation: A dependent noun which expresses the idea that someone does something or something takes place in the same way as something else.

とする_518.explanation: A phrase indicating that someone assumes something.

とする_523.explanation: To have a sensory or psychological experience.

途端（に）_525.translation: The moment; just as; as soon as; then
途端（に）_525.explanation: A noun/adverb which expresses the idea that 'something occurred the moment someone did something or something took place'.

とうとう_528.translation: Finally; at (long) last; eventually; in the end; after all
とうとう_528.explanation: An adverb that is used to express the eventual arrival of an expected situation.

と共に_532.translation: As well as; with; along with; at the same time; when, as; while
と共に_532.explanation: A phrase which is used to express the idea that A and B share a common property or do the same thing together, that two things take place at the same time, or that someone or something possesses two properties.

とは限らない_536.explanation: A phrase which expresses the idea "not necessarily".

つまり_538.translation: That is (to say); namely; in short; to sum up; in other words; after all; that means
つまり_538.explanation: An adverb that is used to summarise or rephrase what has been mentioned/stated in the preceding context.

つつ_542.explanation: (1) an auxiliary which expresses an action in progress; (2) a conjunction which is used to present two concurrent actions.

（の）上で_547.explanation: A compound particle that is used to express a preparatory action for a relatively important action.

上（に）_551.translation: As well; in addition; besides; furthermore; moreover; not only ~ but also
上（に）_551.explanation: A conjunction which introduces an additional, emphatic statement.

得る （うる・える）_553.explanation: An auxiliary verb that expresses possibility.

Vmasu_556.explanation: A continuative form of a verb which means "V and...".

Vmasu as a Noun_561.explanation: Vます used as a regular noun.

は_564.explanation: A particle which emphatically affirms or negates the proposition represented by the preceding verbal and other related elements.

は言うまでもなく_568.translation: Not to speak of; let alone; not to mention; to say nothing of
は言うまでもなく_568.explanation: An adverbial phrase that conveys the meaning of 'not to speak of something/someone'.

わけだ_570.translation: As you know; the fact is that ~; the truth of the matter is that ~
わけだ_570.explanation: A phrase which presents a fact or truth known to the hearer as an introduction to a following statement, or which gives emphasis to a fact or truth which the hearer might not know.

わけではない_574.translation: It does not mean that ~; I don't mean that ~; it is not that ~; it is not true that ~; it is not the case that
わけではない_574.explanation: A phrase which is used to deny what is implied in the previous or following statement.

わけがない_578.translation: There is no reason why ~; it is impossible (for ~) to ~; cannot
わけがない_578.explanation: A phrase which negates the existence of a reason to believe that someone does something or is in some state, or that something takes place; or which negates a possibility of someone's doing something or being in some state, or something's taking place.

わけにはいかない_581.translation: Cannot; cannot but ~; cannot help -ing; have no (other) choice but to ~
わけにはいかない_581.explanation: A phrase which is used to indicate that one cannot do something due to an external circumstance.

やる_584.explanation: To cause something/someone to move to a place or to do/eat/drink something.

やる_589.explanation: An auxiliary verb which expresses the idea that someone does something undesirable to someone else when he/she knows his/her action will cause hardship or trouble.

やっと_591.explanation: An adverb to indicate that something desirable has been finally achieved or will be eventually achieved though with great difficulty.

よう_595.explanation: A noun forming suffix which means a way (of doing something).

よう_599.explanation: An auxiliary verb that expresses the writer's conjecture about some potentiality or his certainty about a given state of affairs.

より_602.translation: More ~ (than now; than something at present; than otherwise)
より_602.explanation: An adverb which forms the comparative of an adjective or an adverb to mean 'more ~ than now or than otherwise'.

ざるを得ない_606.translation: Cannot help -ing; cannot (help) but; have no choice but to ~; have to
ざるを得ない_606.explanation: An auxiliary indicating that there is no other choice but to do something.

ぞ_609.translation: I tell you; I'm telling you; you know
ぞ_609.explanation: A sentence final particle that emphasises a male speaker's emotion about something in his monologue or his strong desire to draw someone else's attention.

あえて_3.translation: Daringly; boldly; dare to ~; venture to ~; force oneself to ~
あえて_3.explanation: An adverb that expresses the speaker's/writer's desire or will to dare to do something in spite of difficulty, danger or opposition.

あげく（に）_7.translation: in the end; finally; eventually; after
あげく（に）_7.explanation: An adverb/conjunction indicating that one spends an extended period of time before reaching a result.

あくまでも_11.translation: to the end; persistently; insist; strictly; just; under any circumstance; absolutely; never; completely; ultimately
あくまでも_11.explanation: An adverb that represents the idea of "to the utmost degree".

あながち～ない_14.explanation: A structure that indicates that something is not necessarily the way the speaker/writer thought.

あたかも_21.translation: (just) as if ~ were; (just) as if ~ did ~; just like; just; exactly
あたかも_21.explanation: An adverb used to present a counter-factual statement emphatically

ばかりに_25.translation: Simply because; just because; simply on account of ~
ばかりに_25.explanation: A conjunction indicating that a single factor causes a negative situation.

ばこそ_27.translation: it is precisely because ~ that ~; only because ~; to the extent that ~
ばこそ_27.explanation: A conjunction that emphasizes a reason

べからず・べからざる_29.grammar_point: べからず・べからざる
べからず・べからざる_29.translation: Shouldn’t; must not; ought not to ~; cannot; don’t ~
べからず・べからざる_29.explanation: An auxiliary verb that indicates a strong prohibition.

べく_32.translation: In order to; to; for the purpose of; for; so that ~ (can)
べく_32.explanation: The verb modification form of the auxiliary bekida, which is used to indicate a purpose or aim.

べくもない_34.translation: Impossible; there is no way for someone to ~; cannot be expected to
べくもない_34.explanation: A phrase meaning “it is impossible to do something”

べくして_36.explanation: A phrase used when something occurs/occured exactly as expected

ちなみに_40.explanation: A conjunction to indicate that what follows is additional information related to the previously stated main theme

だけ_42.translation: As much as; as ~ as possible; as much as one wants
だけ_42.explanation: A particle meaning “to the extent that someone (can/wants to) do something or something can happen”.

だけあって_45.translation: And as one would expect; so (naturally); for good reason
だけあって_45.explanation: A phrase that means “and as one would expect” or “for good reason”.

だけに_47.translation: And as one would expect; so (naturally); because
だけに_47.explanation: A phrase that carries the idea “as one would expect”.

だけのことはある_51.translation: Don’t do something for nothing; ~ explains it; no wonder; it’s no surprise
だけのことはある_51.explanation: A phrase expressing an evaluative comment regarding how something is contributing to an expected, remarkable result.

だに_54.explanation: A particle indicating that something expressed by the preceding verb alone produces a certain feeling or the meaning “(not) even doing something; doesn’t even occur”.

だの_57.translation: And (~ and); or (~ or); and things like that
だの_57.explanation: A conjunction that lists nouns/quotes inexhaustively.

だって_60.explanation: A conjunction that indicates a reason

であれ_67.translation: Even; even if; even though; no matter what/who/how/etc.~ may be; whatever/whoever/etc.~ may be
であれ_67.explanation: A conjunctive phrase that expresses the idea of concession.

～であれ～であれ_71.translation: Whether X or Y; be it X or Y; or
～であれ～であれ_71.explanation: A structure that means “no matter which one is the case”

でも・じゃあるまいし_74.grammar_point: でも・じゃあるまいし
でも・じゃあるまいし_74.translation: You are not ~, so; it isn’t ~, so
でも・じゃあるまいし_74.explanation: A phrase expressing the speaker’s belief that someone’s action is based on mistaken identity of himself/herself and also expressing the speaker’s critical comments about someone’s behaviour.

～でも[Wh. word]でも_76.explanation: A structure indicating that what is expressed in the main/subordinate clause is applicable to anyone, anything, any place or any time.

どちらかと言うと_78.translation: Rather; more like ~; more of ~; rather on the ~ side; rather than otherwise; more ~ than ~
どちらかと言うと_78.explanation: A phrase indicating that the speaker/writer chooses one alternative over another in a tentative way.

どうか_82.explanation: An adverb indicating a polite yet very strong request.

どころではない_85.translation: Cannot; be simply impossible; simply don’t/doesn’t have time; be far from ~; anything but ~; no way; far from; be out of question
どころではない_85.explanation: A phrase indicating that an action/state is simply impossible due to an adverse situation.

ども_88.translation: Even though; although; though; no matter how much/often/hard/etc.
ども_88.explanation: A conjunction that indicates concession based on an actual state or action.

どうにも～ない_92.translation: Not ~ by any means; no matter how hard ~ try, ~ cannot ~; there is no way to ~; cannot do ~ at all
どうにも～ない_92.explanation: A structure indicating that no matter how hard someone may try, something is impossible.

同士_94.translation: Each other; between/among (things/people of the same kind, group, etc.); together; with
同士_94.explanation: A sufﬁx that adds the meaning of “the same things/people”.

が早いか_99.translation: As soon as; the moment; no sooner ~ than
が早いか_99.explanation: A conjunction indicating that as soon as something happens, something else happens.

～が～なら_101.translation: If someone/something were a really good/appropriate one; if something is right
～が～なら_101.explanation: A structure presenting a counterfactual situation which indicates that things would be better if something were really good or appropriate.

ごとし_103.explanation: An auxiliary adjective that indicates a resemblance of something/someone to something/someone or indicates how something/someone appears to speaker/writer.

反面_107.explanation: A conjunction used to contrast the positive and negative sides of something/someone.

はたして_111.translation: Just as ~ though; as expected; really; in fact; sure enough; indeed; at all; lo and behold
はたして_111.explanation: An adverb indicating that something occurred as the writer expected, or expressing in a concession clause the writer’s strong doubt.

ひいては_114.explanation: An adverb indicating that something is perceived to eventually lead to a signiﬁcant result.

一[Counter]として～ない_117.translation: Not a single ~; not even one; not any ~
一[Counter]として～ない_117.explanation: A structure that means “not a single one".

ひとつ_119.explanation: An adverb used when the speaker intends to do something, or asks someone a favour, or makes a suggestion or gives advice to someone.

一つには_122.explanation: An adverb meaning “partly” in a context where someone gives one or two objectives, benefits, examples or reasons for something.

一応_126.translation: For the time being; for the present; for now; tentatively; for formality’s sake; nominally; kind of; sort of
一応_126.explanation: An adverb indicating that an action or state is only temporary or tentative or is superﬁcially conceived.

如何（だ）・いかん（だ）_128.translation: How; what; (depending on) how/what; (according to) how/what; depend on
如何（だ）・いかん（だ）_128.explanation: A classic form of the adverb どのように “in what way”.

いかなる_132.translation: What kind of ~; no matter what ~; whatever; any kind of
いかなる_132.explanation: A noun modifier that means either “what kind of” or “no matter what”.

いくら_138.explanation: A Wh-word that asks about the amount of something.

今更・いまさら_141.explanation: An adverb indicating that someone feels that it is too late to do something.

一方（だ）_146.translation: Only; always; continue to; keep ~ing; be steadily ~ing; become ~er and ~er
一方（だ）_146.explanation: A phrase indicating that “something happens continuously” or “someone does something repeatedly”.

一方（で）_149.translation: While; when; (but) at the same time; on the other hand; even though; although
一方（で）_149.explanation: A conjunction used to present two concurrent actions/events/states or contrastive situations.

一切～ない_159.translation: Not ~ at all; absolutely not; not ~ whatsoever
一切～ない_159.explanation: A structure that means “not at all”.

一旦・いったん_161.translation: Once; for a time; temporarily; for the moment; for the present; now
一旦・いったん_161.explanation: An adverb meaning “once” or “for a short time”.

言ってみれば_164.translation: Figuratively speaking; so to speak; metaphorically speaking; in a manner of saying
言ってみれば_164.explanation: A phrase signalling a comparison (including the use of simile and metaphor), a deﬁnition, or an explanation.

言うまでもない_167.translation: It is needless to say that ~; needless to say; it goes without saying
言うまでもない_167.explanation: A phrase indicating that what the speaker/writer expresses is generally known but that he/she presents it as a reminder.

言わば_170.translation: So to speak; as it were; like; sort of
言わば_170.explanation: An adverb that means “if I were to say it some way (or a different way)”.

いわゆる_172.translation: So-called; what we call; known as
いわゆる_172.explanation: A noun modifier that means “known generally by this term”.

自体_174.translation: Oneself; in and of itself; the very
自体_174.explanation: A dependent noun that is used to emphasize the referent of the preceding noun.

限りだ_177.explanation: A phrase that indicates the extreme degree of the speaker’s/writer’s emotion — happiness, sorrow, envy, shame or loneliness, among others

甲斐・かい・がい_179.explanation: A dependent noun that means something is worth someone’s effort.

か否か (かいなか)_182.explanation: A conjunctive phrase indicating that the speaker/writer is wondering whether something is the case or not.

か否か&nbsp;(かいなか)_182.explanation: A conjunctive phrase indicating that the speaker/writer is wondering whether something is the case or not.

かな_185.translation: How ~ !; what a(n) ~ !; to my/our ~; it is ~ that
かな_185.explanation: An interjection that expresses deep felt emotion.

かのように_187.explanation: A conjunctive phrase that forms an adverbial clause which describes the way someone/something appears to the writer, contrary to reality.

から言って_190.translation: In terms of; from the viewpoint of; judging from
から言って_190.explanation: A phrase that means either “in terms of” or “judging from”.

からなる_192.explanation: A phrase indicating that something consists of more than one member/constituent.

からには_195.translation: Once; now that ~; as long as ~; so long as ~; if
からには_195.explanation: A subordinate conjunction meaning “now that,” “once someone does / has done something” or “so long as”.

からして_199.explanation: A phrase that singles out something for emphasis or presents something as a basis for judgment.

仮に (かりに)_201.translation: Supposing that; suppose; providing that; (even) if
仮に (かりに)_201.explanation: An adverb that indicates the speaker’s/writer’s tentative supposition.

かと思うと_206.translation: As soon as (one notices that) ~; soon after; when one thinks/feels that ~
かと思うと_206.explanation: A phrase indicating that an action or state in the dependent clause occurs very closely with another action or state in the clause, or causes another action or state in the main clause.

且つ・かつ_209.translation: And; and also; yet; but; and ~ as well; as well as; moreover
且つ・かつ_209.explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that connects words, phrases and sentences.

きらいがある_214.translation: Have a tendency to; tend to; have a touch of ~; have a dash of ~; smack of ~; be slightly ~
きらいがある_214.explanation: A phrase indicating that someone or something has an undesirable tendency.

（っ）きり_219.explanation: A conjunction indicating that since something occurred, nothing has happened and the resultant situation remains unchanged; a particle indicating a strict limitation in terms of number/quantity.

っけ_223.explanation: A colloquial sentence final particle marking a question.

この上ない_226.translation: Extremely; utterly; very; so; cannot be more; extreme; utmost
この上ない_226.explanation: A phrase that indicates that something or someone is in an extreme state.

ことか_230.explanation: A sentence final, exclamatory phrase used in written language.

ことから_233.translation: Because; due to; from the fact that ~; cause; trigger
ことから_233.explanation: A phrase that expresses a reason or a cause.

ことに_235.translation: It is ~ that; I am ~ that; we are ~ that; to my/our ~; ~ly
ことに_235.explanation: A phrase that expresses the speaker’s/ writer’s emotion or subjective judgment.

加えて_240.translation: In addition; and additionally; what’s more
加えて_240.explanation: A conjunction that means “in addition to what has just been mentioned”.

加えて (くわえて)_240.translation: In addition; and additionally; what’s more
加えて (くわえて)_240.explanation: A conjunction that means “in addition to what has just been mentioned”.

加えて (くわえて)<br>_240.translation: In addition; and additionally; what’s more
加えて (くわえて)<br>_240.explanation: A conjunction that means “in addition to what has just been mentioned”.

加えて&nbsp;(くわえて)_240.translation: In addition; and additionally; what’s more
加えて&nbsp;(くわえて)_240.explanation: A conjunction that means “in addition to what has just been mentioned”.

まで（のこと）だ_243.explanation: A phrase indicating someone’s decision to cope with a negative situation, or a simple, straight forward reason for his/her action.

まして（や）_245.translation: To say nothing of; not to speak of; let alone; still more; much less; all the more reason why
まして（や）_245.explanation: An adverb expressing the idea that because one statement is true, the subsequent statement is naturally true.

また_248.translation: Again; also; too; (not) ~ either; and; additionally; or
また_248.explanation: An adverb/conjunction that indicates repetition or addition.

滅多に～ない_252.explanation: A structure that indicates extremely low frequency.

見るからに_254.translation: Visibly; obviously; really look; can be easily recognised as; can tell just by looking at ~
見るからに_254.explanation: A phrase indicating that something can be (obviously) recognized through visual cues.

～も[V]ば～も[V]_258.translation: There are times when ~ and/or ~; sometimes ~ and sometimes ~; sometimes do things like ~ and ~; some (people/etc.) ~ and some (people/etc.) ~
～も[V]ば～も[V]_258.explanation: A structure used to present typical examples of actions, events, situations, people, or things among a number of possibilities.

ものではない_263.translation: Shouldn’t; not possibly; naturally cannot; cannot bear
ものではない_263.explanation: A sentence-ﬁnal phrase indicating that one shouldn’t do something, one could not possibly do something, or one naturally cannot do something.

ものか_266.explanation: A rhetorical question marker that expresses a strong negative intention or disagreement.

ものか_268.explanation: A phrase indicating that the speaker wants to do something or is wondering what one he/she should choose.

ものなら_272.explanation: A conjunction indicating that the preceding clause presents a hypothetical situation that is unlikely to become a reality.

ものを_279.explanation: A disjunctive coordinate conjunction expressing the meaning of “although” with the speaker’s strong feeling of discontent

もさることながら_283.translation: ~ is one thing, but; it is true that ~, but; it is the case that ~, but; but more importantly
もさることながら_283.explanation: A phrase used to mention something important and then introduce something more signiﬁcant.

もしくは_285.explanation: A conjunction to disjunctively connect two items or ideas.

もっとも_288.explanation: A conjunction used to add a comment indicating that what the speaker/writer has just expressed is not sufﬁcient.

向け_291.translation: For; made for; for the use of; aimed at; directed towards; (directed/shipped/etc.) to
向け_291.explanation: A suffix that adds the meaning of “aimed at”

むしろ_295.explanation: An adverb that indicates one of two things/people/characteristics has been chosen rather than the other to express speaker’s/writer’s desire, preference or judgment.

ないでもない_300.explanation: A phrase that indicates the speaker/writer hesitantly feels or expresses that something is the case.

ないことには_303.explanation: A phrase that means “if something has not taken place, something else won’t/can’t take place”.

ないまでも_305.translation: May not ~ but; even though ~ not; although ~ not
ないまでも_305.explanation: An adverbial phrase expressing the speaker’s feeling that although an ideal action or state isn’t possible, at least the next best action or state is or should be available.

ないし（は）_307.explanation: A particle that presents two possible choices or the minimum and maximum possible numbers/lengths/weights/etc. of something; or a conjunction that links two possible actions or events.

中を_312.translation: In the midst of; when; while; through; among
中を_312.explanation: A phrase that specifies space or time in/through which someone/something does something.

なくして（は）_315.translation: Without; if it were not for ~

なまじ（っか）_318.translation: Halfheartedly; slightly; thoughtlessly; unwisely; inadequately; imperfectly; sort of; a little; somewhat; a bit of
なまじ（っか）_318.explanation: An adverb indicating that something (including an action/state) has a positive value which hasn’t been reached, causing something negative.

並み_323.translation: About the same level as; like; as (much ~) as; to match; to rival; on a par with; equivalent to
並み_323.explanation: A noun sufﬁx that adds the meaning “to match”.

何[(Number)+Counter]も_326.explanation: A phrase that indicates there is a large number of things, people, etc.

何～ない_328.explanation: A structure indicating that something doesn't exist at all.

何も～ない_331.translation: Why ~ have to ~?; it is unnecessary to ~; have no good reason to ~; not need to ~
何も～ない_331.explanation: A structure indicating that an action is taken for no good reason.

何らかの_333.explanation: A phrase used to indicate that the exact nature of something represented by the noun cannot be speciﬁed.

何ら～ない_334.translation: Not ~ at all; not any ~; nothing; no ~ whatsoever
何ら～ない_334.explanation: A structure that is used to express a strong negative statement.

なんて_337.explanation: A phrase used as the colloquial version of なんと.

なんて_339.explanation: A colloquial particle used to express a strong feeling such as astonishment, incredulousness, envy, disdain, dislike, happiness, etc.

何とか_341.translation: Somehow; in some way; in one way or another; manage to
何とか_341.explanation: An adverb expressing that someone somehow does something, or something somehow occurs.

なお_344.translation: Still; even more; all the more for ~; additional; and; additionally; furthermore
なお_344.explanation: An adverb that indicates that an action or state is still going on or the degree of something increases; a conjunction indicating that an additional comment follows what has just been said in the preceding sentence.

なおさら_348.translation: Still more; much more; all the more; even more
なおさら_348.explanation: An adverb indicating that the degree of something increases due to an additional circumstance.

ならでは（の）_350.translation: Impossible if it’s not ~; only possible with/by/at/etc.; not possible with/by/at/etc. other ~; very difficult with/by/at/etc. any other ~ but; you can expect only/at/from/etc.; unless
ならでは（の）_350.explanation: A phrase indicating something is “impossible if it’s not X”.

並びに_353.translation: And; both ~ and ~; as well as
並びに_353.explanation: A conjunction used to combine two nouns or noun phrases.

なり_355.translation: The moment; when; as soon as; soon after; no sooner ~ than

なるほど_359.translation: Indeed; it is true ~ (but); really; I see
なるほど_359.explanation: An adverb indicating that the speaker/writer afﬁrms the correctness of something he/she has heard/read/observed.

なす_365.explanation: A verb that means “to cause something to happen”

なぜか_370.translation: I don’t know why; without knowing why; for an unknown reason
なぜか_370.explanation: An adverb indicating that the speaker/writer doesn’t know the cause of/reason for something

なぜなら（ば）～からだ_371.explanation: A structure used to introduce a reason for the statement in the preceding sentence.

んばかり（に）_374.translation: As if ~ were about to ~; almost
んばかり（に）_374.explanation: An adverbial phrase that is used when a situation looks as if someone were about to do something or as if something were about to occur literally or ﬁguratively.

願う・願います_377.explanation: A verb that expresses a polite request.

にひきかえ_380.explanation: A phrase that indicates a sharp contrast.

にいたっては_384.translation: When it comes to ~; as for; for example
にいたっては_384.explanation: A compound particle that indicates an extreme example.

にかかわらず・に関/拘/係わらず_386.grammar_point: にかかわらず・に関/拘/係わらず
にかかわらず・に関/拘/係わらず_386.translation: Regardless of; independent of; without reference to; without distinguishing; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.
にかかわらず・に関/拘/係わらず_386.explanation: A compound particle that means “regardless of”

にかけては_391.translation: When it comes to ~; as for; in point of; in terms of; about; regarding
にかけては_391.explanation: A compound particle that marks something in which someone excels or has conﬁdence.

にかたくない・に難くない_393.grammar_point: にかたくない・に難くない
にかたくない・に難くない_393.explanation: A phrase that indicates that it is not hard to imagine or guess a situation.

に決まっている_395.translation: Surely; be bound to; be a given; of course; must be; we all know that
に決まっている_395.explanation: A phrase indicating the speaker’s/writer’s strong conviction or motivation.

に越したことはない_398.translation: Nothing is better than; if possible; be the best; be ideal; the ~ the ~
に越したことはない_398.explanation: A phrase used to indicate that a state or action is more desirable.

に/ともなると_401.explanation: A phrase that is used when something or some situation is perceived to be special.

に向けて・に向けた_404.translation: Toward; to; at; aiming at; targeting; for; for the purpose of; in order to
に向けて・に向けた_404.explanation: A compound particle that indicates the destination/direction of movement, the target/direction of an action, or the goal/purpose of an action.

～に～ない_408.translation: Cannot manage to; just cannot; cannot ~ even though ~ want to; cannot ~ despite the fact that ~ want to
～に～ない_408.explanation: A sentence structure meaning “someone cannot manage to do something”

に（も）なく_411.explanation: A phrase that means something unusual happens or someone does something unusual.

に応じて・応じた_412.translation: In response to; according to; depending on; appropriate for; suitable for; suited to; meet
に応じて・応じた_412.explanation: A compound particle that means “in response to”.

にしろ・せよ_418.translation: Even though (it is/was the case that); even if (it is true that); although (it is/was the case that); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y
にしろ・せよ_418.explanation: A conjunctive phrase that carries the meaning of concession.

にしたところで_423.explanation: A compound particle that means “even” or “also”.

にして_426.explanation: A compound particle that indicates a period of time/stage (in life) at which some surprising action or state takes place.

にして_429.explanation: A conjunction meaning “and” that is used to combine two noun phrases or な-adjectives.

にしてからが_432.explanation: A compound particle indicating that something unexpected occurs.

にしても_435.translation: Even if (someone decides to/it is true that); although/even though (it is true that/it is the case that/we admit that/we agree that/etc.); whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y; as for ~, too; even (so)
にしても_435.explanation: A conjunction that represents the idea of “even if someone decides to do something,” or “even if/though someone decides that something is true/the case”.

にとどまらず_440.translation: Doesn’t stop with ~; doesn’t end with ~; not limited to ~; going beyond ~; not only ~ (but also ~)
にとどまらず_440.explanation: A phrase indicating that something goes beyond a spatial/temporal boundary.

につけ_444.explanation: A conjunction indicating that each time someone perceives something he/she feels or thinks something associated with it.

にわたって・わたる_447.translation: For; over; extending; stretching; ranging; covering
にわたって・わたる_447.explanation: A compound particle indicating that something takes place over a particular span of time or physical space.

によると_459.explanation: A compound particle that is used to identify the source of information provided in the sentence.

によらず_452.translation: Without; without ~ing; regardless of; independently of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
によらず_452.explanation: A compound particle that means “without depending on”.

のみならず_461.translation: Not only ~ (but also ~); not only that
のみならず_461.explanation: A phrase that is used in formal writing to mean “not only”.

のなんのって_465.translation: So (~ that); so much/well (~ that); so ~ and
のなんのって_465.explanation: A phrase to emphasize that something/someone is/was in an extreme state or that someone does/did something to a great extent

の無さ・のなさ_468.explanation: A phrase that indicates a state where something is lacking.

～の～のと_470.translation: Saying ~, ~, and so on; saying ~ or ~
～の～のと_470.explanation: A structure that states what is said by someone in order to express the speaker’s disagreement or dissatisfaction.

んとする_474.translation: Try to do; be about to
んとする_474.explanation: A phrase meaning for “someone to try to do something” or for “something to be about to occur”.

を中心に_477.translation: Centering around; around; focusing on; mainly; primarily; with ~ as the center; with ~ as the leader; with ~ as the primary ~; take the lead
を中心に_477.explanation: A phrase that means “with something/someone at the centre”.

を介して/介した_479.translation: Through; via; by means of; by ~ing
を介して/介した_479.explanation: A compound particle that introduces a medium through which someone does something or something happens to someone or something.

を禁じ得ない_483.translation: Cannot hold; cannot hold back; cannot keep back; cannot help ~ing; cannot keep ~ from ~ing
を禁じ得ない_483.explanation: A phrase that is used when one cannot control emotions or reactions caused by emotions.

をめぐって・めぐる_486.translation: Centering around; in connection with; over; concerning; regarding; with regard to
をめぐって・めぐる_486.explanation: A compound particle meaning “concerning; over”, which is used with an issue over which different opinions, ideas, etc., are expressed or exchanged.

思えば_492.translation: Come ot think of it; when I think back; on reflection
思えば_492.explanation: An adverb that indicates feelings of nostalgia or regret when recollecting one’s past experiences.

をものともせず_493.translation: In spite of ~; undaunted by ~; in definance of ~; in the face of ~
をものともせず_493.explanation: A phrase indicating that someone does something bravely/fearlessly in spite of unfavourable circumstances.

思うに_496.translation: In my view; it seems to me that ~; when I think (about ~); considering
思うに_496.explanation: A phrase indicating that the subsequent statement is the speaker’s/writer’s personal view.

をおいてほかに（は）～ない_499.grammar_point: をおいてほかに（は）～ない
をおいてほかに（は）～ない_499.translation: (there is) no ~ but X; X is the only one; nothing else is ~ but X; no other ~ are/do something as ~ as X
をおいてほかに（は）～ない_499.explanation: A phrase that means “there is nothing else besides X”.

折(に)_502.translation: On the occasion; at the time; when; if; opportunity; chance
折(に)_502.explanation: A noun indicating special/uncommon and primarily desirable occasions which someone takes advantage of, or where someone is expected to do something or where something desirable takes place.

恐れがある_509.translation: It is feared (that); we fear (that); we are worried/concerned (that); there is a fear/risk/chance/concern/etc.; can; could; may; it is possible (that); be in danger of
恐れがある_509.explanation: A phrase that means “it is feared (that)"

を問わず_514.translation: Regardless of; irrespective of; without reference to; whether X or Y; whether X or not; whatever/whoever/etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.
を問わず_514.explanation: A compound particle that means “without questioning”.

及び_521.explanation: A particle that connects two nouns or noun phrases.

およそ_526.translation: Generally; commonly; all; quite entirely; totally; utterly; (not) at all; for the most part; mostly; almost; approximately; roughly; about; rough; general
およそ_526.explanation: An adverb representing the ideas “all; totally; mostly; approximately”.

をよそに_531.translation: Indifferent to ~; contrary to ~; ignoring ~; despite
をよそに_531.explanation: A compound particle that expresses someone’s indifference to warnings, criticism, advice, accusations, opposition, anxiety, wishes, eagerness, provocative actions, etc.

さも_534.translation: Truly; really; as if; so; that way; like that
さも_534.explanation: An adverb meaning “truly,” used when describing the way someone’s action or behaviour appears.

更に_540.translation: Even ~er; even more; additional; more; further; furthermore; in addition
更に_540.explanation: An adverb/conjunction that represents the idea of “additionally” or “further”.

さて_543.explanation: An interjection indicating that the speaker/writer is going to talk about something different.

さぞ（かし）_547.translation: I believe/I’m sure/I’m certain ~ very/really/truly ~; must be very/really/truly ~
さぞ（かし）_547.explanation: An adverb that is used when the speaker thinks that someone or something is in an extreme state.

そもそも（の）_550.translation: In the first place; to begin with; first of all; the very (beginning/origin/etc.); original; first; fundamental
そもそも（の）_550.explanation: A sentence-modifying adverb used when the speaker/writer comments on or questions a fundamental point.

そのもの_553.translation: Itself; themselves; very; perfect; the definition of; the picture of; absolutely; totally; utterly; perfectly
そのもの_553.explanation: A phrase used to refer strictly to the preceding noun (phrase) or adjective.

それだけ_557.translation: That much; to the same extent; to the same degree; equally
それだけ_557.explanation: An adverbial phrase indicating that the degree of something is proportionate to the degree of the state, action or event mentioned in the preceding sentence.

それなりに・の_559.translation: In one’s own way; accompanying; proportionate; suitable; expected; agreeable; reasonable; one’s own; proper to
それなりに・の_559.explanation: A phrase representing the idea that someone/something does something or is in a state in his/her/its own way, or in a way suitable to the situation or generally expected from the situation.

末（に）_562.explanation: A noun that indicates the end of a period or the time after long, hard mental or physical work.

済む_565.translation: Take/cost/need/etc. only ~; do/manage (without/only with); get by/get away (without/only with); be let off (without/only with); be enough (if); be all right (if); not to have to: there is no need for
済む_565.explanation: A verb that means “to be finished; to do (in the sense of being enough)”.

ただ_570.translation: But; however; only; the only thing is that ~
ただ_570.explanation: A conjunction that introduces a supplementary remark.

但し・ただし_573.translation: However; but; only; here; provided that
但し・ただし_573.explanation: A conjunction indicating that there is a condition, restriction, proviso, etc., to the preceding statement.

たかが_576.explanation: A noun modiﬁer used when the speaker thinks little of the referent of the modiﬁed noun or noun phrase.

たなり（で）_580.explanation: A conjunction indicating that a situation or condition remains unaltered.

単位で_582.translation: By the; in sets/groups/lots/etc. of; in multiples of; each; every
単位で_582.explanation: A phrase that indicates the smallest amount, number or unit of something (or people) involved.

単に_586.translation: Just; only; simply; no more than; nothing but; solely; merely; alone

たるや_591.translation: When it comes to ~; speaking of
たるや_591.explanation: A compound particle used to present a subtopic about which the writer provides surprising or impressive information.

（っ）たって_594.explanation: The informal form of ても.

（っ）たって_597.explanation: The contracted form of と言っても or としても.

てばかりはいられない_600.grammar_point: てばかりはいられない
てばかりはいられない_600.translation: Cannot just; cannot always; cannot just keep ~ing; cannot spend time just ~ing; cannot waste time just ~ing
てばかりはいられない_600.explanation: A phrase representing the idea that someone cannot just keep doing something or waste time being consumed by some emotion.

～ても～ても_603.translation: No matter how much/often/hard/etc.; no matter how many times
～ても～ても_603.explanation: A structure meaning “even if someone does something repeatedly”.

て仕方がない_605.translation: Cannot help ~ing; cannot stop feeling; (so ~ and) cannot control ~; so ~ and ~ cannot bare it; so; unbearably
て仕方がない_605.explanation: A phrase that represents emotions the speaker/writer cannot control or sensations/situations he/she cannot bear.

てはいられない_609.translation: Cannot/shouldn’t be ~ing; cannot/shouldn’t keep ~ing; cannot/shouldn’t (stay/remain/etc.); cannot/shouldn’t waste time ~ing; cannot afford to; cannot help ~ing
てはいられない_609.explanation: A phrase that is used when someone cannot be doing something or be in some state due to a given situation.

とあって_612.translation: Because ~, ~ as expected; because ~, naturally ~; because
とあって_612.explanation: A phrase that introduces a reason when the speaker/writer considers it natural that someone does something or is in some state, or that something takes place for that reason.

とあっては_615.translation: If it is true that; if it is the case that; if; because; since
とあっては_615.explanation: A conditional phrase that indirectly presents a factual situation as a reason.

とばかりに_618.translation: As if; as if to say that; as if ~ were convinced that; as if ~ believed that; as if ~ decided that
とばかりに_618.explanation: A phrase that indicates that someone does something in order to convey something or in such a way that someone is convinced that something is the case.

とでも言うべき_622.translation: Which could/may be called; which can/could be described as
とでも言うべき_622.explanation: A phrase that introduces a noun (or noun phrase) to describe the nature of someone or something.

といえども_624.translation: Even; any; although; though; even though
といえども_624.explanation: A conjunction that expresses the idea of “even (though)”.

～といい～といい_628.translation: In terms of both ~ and ~; in terms of ~ as well as ~; from the perspective of both ~ and ~
～といい～といい_628.explanation: A structure that introduces multiple perspectives when describing a person or a thing.

といった_629.explanation: A compound particle that introduces examples.

といったところだ_633.translation: I would say ~; ~ is how I’d put it
といったところだ_633.explanation: A phrase the speaker/writer uses to explain something in a brief/rough manner.

と言って_635.explanation: A conjunction used at the beginning of a sentence to convey the idea of “however”.

と言うか_638.translation: Or; or rather; or I’d (rather) call it; or I may call it; or I’d (rather) say; or I may say
と言うか_638.explanation: A phrase used to restate what was just said in order to be more accurate or appropriate.

と言うのは_640.translation: (I’m saying this) because; the reason (why I’m saying this) is that; by ~ I mean that; what I mean is that
と言うのは_640.explanation: A phrase that introduces the reason for what has just been said.

~言わず~と言わず_643.translation: A, B and many other ~; A, B and every ~ else; including: whether X or Y
~言わず~と言わず_643.explanation: A structure indicating that something is the case not only for A and B but also for many other places, things, etc., of X, to which A and B belong

ところから_645.translation: Because; be caused by the fact that ~; from the fact that ~
ところから_645.explanation: A phrase that introduces the origins of names, theories, ideas and events.

ともなく_648.translation: Without intending to; without paying much attention; unconsciously; mindlessly; don’t know (exactly) who/where/etc. (but); cannot tell (exactly) who/where/etc. (but); (to/from) no particular (person, etc.)
ともなく_648.explanation: A phrase indicating that the subject does something without paying much attention, or that when, where, to whom, etc., something took place is unclear.

ともすると_651.translation: Tend to; apt to; be likely to; easily; be bound to
ともすると_651.explanation: A phrase that expresses the idea that something is likely to take place.

との_655.explanation: A phrase that presents the content of the referent of the following noun (e.g., a report, notice, news, view).

とても～ない_658.translation: Cannot possibly; totally impossible; there is no possibility; there is no way; not ~ at all; not ~ by any means; by no means
とても～ない_658.explanation: A structure that is used to deny emphatically the ability of someone/something or possibility of an event, state or action

とは_661.explanation: A compound particle marking an event, action or state that the speaker/writer does not expect and that causes him/her to feel some emotion

とは言え_664.translation: Although (it is said that/someone says that); even though (it is said that/someone says that); admitting that; that being said; however; nevertheless
とは言え_664.explanation: A conjunctive phrase meaning “although it is said that”

つい_668.translation: Unintentionally; without being able to control onself; without meaning to; carelessly; involuntarily; in spite of oneself; just; only
つい_668.explanation: An adverb used to describe someone doing something without being able to control himself/herself or used to indicate the closeness of a time or a place.

ついでに_671.translation: When; while (~ at it); as; on one’s way to; since ~ (anyway); as well; at one’s convenience
ついでに_671.explanation: A phrase used to express the idea that someone does a second thing at the same time as the first because it takes less time or effort.

ついては_674.translation: Therefore; thus; so; because of this; for this reason; with regard to this
ついては_674.explanation: A sentence-initial conjunction that means “with regard to this,” referring to what is stated in the preceding sentence.

（と言）ったらない_678.translation: So; extremely; indescribably; indescribable; incredibly; awfully; terribly; cannot tell you/describe/etc. how; too much of
（と言）ったらない_678.explanation: A phrase used to express a strong sensation or emotion.

はあれ_683.translation: Even though there is; although there is; there is ~ but
はあれ_683.explanation: A phrase expressing the idea “even though there is something”

は別として_685.translation: Except for; putting/setting aside; whether X or Y
は別として_685.explanation: A phrase used to present an exception or an issue the speaker/writer does not intend to cover as part of a larger statement.

はいいとしても_691.translation: Be all right, but; might be all right, but; would be fine, but; would accept ~, but; even if ~ accept; even though ~ accept; although ~ accept
はいいとしても_691.explanation: A phrase that conveys the meaning “even if I/we accept something, something else is not acceptable”.

はおろか_694.translation: Let alone; not only ~ (but also ~); not to mention; to say nothing of; never mind; much less
はおろか_694.explanation: A phrase that is used when something is not only true with one thing or person, but also with another thing or person that is less expected or understandable.

割に（は）_697.translation: For; despite; although; (not) as much as; (not) ~ because of that; considering
割に（は）_697.explanation: A phrase that expresses the idea that something is not in proportion to what one would normally expect.

～わ～わ_701.translation: X and Y; for example, X and Y; because X and Y; so many; so much; one after another
～わ～わ_701.explanation: A structure that emphatically presents actions, events or states as examples or reasons, or indicates that someone does something or something happens to a great extent.

や否や・やいなや_706.translation: As soon as; no sooner ~ than; the moment; soon after; immediately after
や否や・やいなや_706.explanation: A conjunction that expresses the idea that something happened or someone did something immediately following another event or action.

やら_715.explanation: A sentence-ﬁnal particle that marks a self-addressed question.

～やら～やら_720.translation: X and Y; things like X and Y; X, Y and so on; whether X or Y; whether X or not
～やら～やら_720.explanation: A structure to present things, events, actions, etc., as examples, reasons or possibilities.

ようでは_725.translation: If; if it is true that; if it is the case that
ようでは_725.explanation: A conjunction that presents an undesirable situation, which is assumed to be factual.

ようものなら_728.translation: If ~ happen to; if ~ at all; if ~ choose to
ようものなら_728.explanation: A conjunctive phrase that presents　an undesirable hypothetical situation.

ようにも（～ない）_730.translation: Even though ~ try/want to ~; even though ~ be thinking of doing ~; although ~ try/want to ~; although ~ be thinking of doing ~
ようにも（～ない）_730.explanation: A conjunctive phrase that indicates concession: “even though someone tries to do something, he/she cannot do it for some reason”.

より・のほか（に）（は）～ない_734.grammar_point: より・のほか（に）（は）～ない
より・のほか（に）（は）～ない_734.translation: There is no (other) choice but to; there is no other way than to; have to; nothing but; but; not ~ other than
より・のほか（に）（は）～ない_734.explanation: A phrase that conveys the idea that there is no other choice than to do something, or that something is true of only one of a select few things.

由・よし_738.explanation: A dependent noun that marks the content of what the writer has learned.

ようと・が_740.translation: Even if; whatever/whoever/ etc.; no matter what/who/how/etc.; whether X or Y
ようと・が_740.explanation: A conjunctive phrase that expresses the idea of concession.

故に・ゆえに_745.translation: Because; because of; due to; therefore
故に・ゆえに_745.explanation: A conjunction that presents a reason or a cause.

ずにはおかない_750.translation: Be bound to; definitely; unmistakably; unquestionably; undoubtedly; without fail; without doubt
ずにはおかない_750.explanation: A phrase that expresses the idea that someone/something necessarily or naturally causes something to happen.

ずして_753.translation: Without ~ing; before (~ing); with no ~; if ~ do not; when ~ do not

ずとも_755.translation: Without ~ing; even if ~ not; if ~ not
ずとも_755.explanation: A conjunctive phrase that indicates negative concession: “even if ~ not”.
